intro: This document serves as both the Product Specification and User Manual for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS) CLC+ Backbone Raster Product 2021. It provides a comprehensive overview of the product, which is a 10-meter spatial resolution, pixel-based land cover map of the EEA-38 region derived from Sentinel-2 time series data. The manual details the product's characteristics, production methodologies, workflows, quality assessment, access and use conditions, and provides technical support information, enabling users to effectively utilise the CLC+ Backbone for various land monitoring and environmental applications.
